name: Godot Jame June 2018 - Hot Iron Gauges
name_original: Godot Jame June 2018 - Hot Iron Gauges
description:
Entry for Godot Jam - the theme was temperature so we went for keeping furnaces burning on your mech.  

I did the programming and model colour/rigging.  Base meshes, sprites, the logo, the mech theme and the name were by a friend.  

It's nowhere near finished but it was a learning experience.

Controls:

A/D or Left Analog: Turn left/right.
Arrow Left/Right or D-pad Left/Right: Switch furnaces.
Space or A button: Add coal.
Q/E or Right Analog: Look left/right.
Enter or Start: Start game.  Restart when you win, die or run out of coal.

Furnaces:

Left: Punch Attack
Middle: Walk
Right: Pile Bunker Attack

You are only able to turn and add fuel to a furnace.  Within these limitations you have to defeat the other mechs.

Unfinished features: Animations are wonky, some collision boxes stick around after attacks, enemies are very single minded and don't mind friendly fire... and many more. :)
